# Setup

```{r packages}
sapply(list("sf", "tidyverse", "raster", "ows4R"), 
       library, character.only = TRUE, logical.return = TRUE)

source(here("R", "download_fisbroker_metadata.R"))
```


# Data

```{r data}
temp_14 <- raster(here("data-raw", "berlin", "climate_model_berlin_14h_2016_25833", "t2m14h", "t2m14h.tif"))

crs(temp_14) <- st_crs(25833)$proj4string

berlin_district <- st_read(here("data-raw", "berlin", "berlin_districts_2020_3035", "berlin_districts_2020_3035.gpkg"))

temp_ras <- raster(here("data-proc", "berlin", 
                                   "template_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035",
                                   "template_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035.tif"))

temp_14_3035 <- projectRaster(temp_14, temp_ras)

temp_14_3035_res <- resample(temp_14_3035, temp_ras)

temp_14_3035_res[is.na(temp_14_3035_res)] <- 0

temp_14_3035_res_mask <- raster::mask(x = temp_14_3035_res, 
                                 mask = berlin_district,
                                 updatevalue = NA
                                 )
plot(temp_14_3035_res_mask)

create_meta_raster(file = temp_14_3035_res_mask,
                   name = "summer_temperature_berlin_14h",
                   epsg = "3035",
                   date = "2016",
                   units = "Â°C in 2 m height",
                   descr = "reprojected to 3035 and resampled",
                   orig_source = read.csv(here("data-raw", "berlin", "climate_model_berlin_14h_2016_25833", "metadata_climate_model_berlin_14h_2016_25833.csv"), header = TRUE)$source,
                   data_source = here("data-raw", "berlin", "summer_temperature_14h_2016_25833", "t2m14h", "t2m14h.tif"),
                   d_down = NA,
                   mod = "reprojected to 3035 and resampled",
                   path = "data-proc/berlin",
                   folder = TRUE)

writeRaster(temp_14_3035_res_mask, here("data-proc", "berlin", "summer_temperature_berlin_14h_2016_3035", "summer_temperature_berlin_14h_2016_3035.tif"))
```
